website_summaries.verdict: This cleverly constructed pet sling carrier showcases useful features alongside supreme durability.
pros: Waterproof fabric keeps pet and belongings dry in inclement weather conditions
Use the strap to adjust your pet to the height you want
High-quality sling design offers supreme comfort for shoulders
Includes a leash ring and safety mesh net
cons: A few buyers had issues with the item arriving damaged
Too small to support dogs over 12 pounds

customer_reviews.title: Chester likes it!
customer_reviews.text: My old dog pushed the weight limits of this product (20 lbs) - and I knew that - but this works just fine! At first he was hesitant to be put into it, but now that he realizes he gets to go with us on our 2x daily walks, he likes it a lot. I don't have to leave him home when I walk the young dog. And the sling is comfortable enough that it doesn't kill my joints to pack the old guy around. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Best sling carrier out there!  Amazing customer service- pet safety and human comfort- happy customers!!  Thank you Mr Chin!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! Second sling I purchased ( first from this company). This will be my go to carrier for my cavalier. I LOVE THE MESH to keep them securely in the carrier. Also helps conceal them when going into businesses! I did find that the snap on the pocket is bent and unusable! I cannot figure out how to contact the manufacturer for a repair or replacement Mr Chin- how can I contact you??? Manufacturer contacted me- now that’s a customer service rarity! I highly recommend this company! Very eager to please their customers!
customer_reviews.author: Suzi’s Zoo

customer_reviews.title: Love this pet sling carrier
customer_reviews.text: Love this pet sling carrier. This is the second bag I have gotten for my 12 pound chihuahua mix. It's got plenty of room inside. I even put a blanket inside to wrap around her on cold days. I love the pockets because I can keep treats and my phone in them. The material is very sturdy and I am not worried about it tearing. I bought a cloth one before and it didn't seem as well made. Would definitely recommend this product. It was difficult to find a carrier that would fit my girl but this one would fit an even larger dog than mine.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Great sling for your dog.
customer_reviews.text: I love this sling and so does my dachshund puppy Jax! Jax weighs 14lbs and it is hard finding something to fit his size. I am hoping to use it on bike rides with him. He loves to burrow down into it and feels comfortable and safe with me. The quality of this product is amazing. Great sturdy strap with durable, strong fabric. The feel of this is super comfortable for us both. This is probably my all time favorite amazon purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dog who just got TPLO surgery to fix his torn acl. Thought it would be hard to get him to like it but he really enjoys it. It’s actually hard to get him out! Good quality no complaints! My dog is a 10 pound Maltese and he has plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha brown

customer_reviews.title: Worked PERFECTLY for me 13 pound cat.
customer_reviews.text: My cat, Squid, is a giant pain when I take him to the vet. In his carrier, he cries and whines all the way there. So I needed something different. When I put him in this sling he was unsure but after 5 minutes he ended up liking it. When we were in the car I put the sling over myself and he laid on my stomach and then when I walked into the vets office he was hanging in the sling pretty contently and not meowing at all. The vet tech’s thought it was the cutest thing, too. Thank you! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Concern for the QC of product
customer_reviews.text: Just received my bag. Love the bag, but sadly have two issues that are causing an exchange. First issue and most alarming is a sharp piece of metal that was exposed on the plastic, cinching cord for the mesh interior. See picture Also the other issue was the broken snap for one pocket. See picture Giving this one more shot with a replacement, but if the same issues are present, I will be requesting a refund. There definitely is a lack of QC prior to leaving the manufacturing center... cannot rate more than a 1star at the minute until I see the replacement bag. If the replacement is satisfactory, I will update
customer_reviews.author: RA

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I’m glad I didn’t go for the cheaper version and paid attention to all the reviews. My YorkiePoo Zoey (8ILBS) seems to like the bag. I try to take her every where with me. I’ve just used purses in the past to carry her but after about 20 min my shoulder is killing me! The shoulder strap on this is not only adjustable (I’m only 5’0 tall) but it’s also padded for extra comfort. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: kiani

customer_reviews.title: Great product! We have a 22lb Yorkie
customer_reviews.text: Great product! We have a 22lb Yorkie. She gets very anxious with certain noises & wants to be held for long periods of time. Due to her weight those times become challenging & you have to put her down for a bit then pick her up again. Some of her triggers are the dish washer, thunder storms & fire works. The Pet Sling Carrier is the perfect solution. I was so happy to find a sling carrier that holds a bigger dog. We tried it out on Christmas Day & it works very well. Thanks for making a product that is very well made, reasonably priced & really works!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of two

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable and comfortable for Pup!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Perfect size for my 6 pound Affenspincher, wallet and cell phone. It does have pockets on the outside but I prefer putting my cell and wallet in with my pup. That way he can check his social media sites as well. The shoulder strap is padded and does not hurt my shoulder after walker around for sometime with my baby.
customer_reviews.author: franchesca2bqq

customer_reviews.title: Pup purse
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to use with my 13 lb mini dachshund. It’s snug but still has room to spare. Can’t tell if the pooch likes it, or is scared. Fits comfortably on me as it has a wide, padded shoulder strap. Seems well made with durable, soft fabric. Has small pocket with snap button on both sides.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany K.

customer_reviews.title: Works great and very good material
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'6" 118lbs and this sling bag fits just perfectly across my body. The material is nice and it's comfortable on my shoulder, i can carry 9lbs of puppies in it for few hours without feeling tired. My one recommendation is the zipper on top, it does not zip all the way around, would be better if there's button or velco to keep the top closed when needed. The side pockets on the shoulder strap area is also very helpful for tugging in the ends of the leash when I let the pup wear it for extra safety. Well made i would recommend this carrier sling.
customer_reviews.author: Virge L

customer_reviews.title: Important training tool
customer_reviews.text: The first weeks after a puppy gets home are important, it's the imprint time which lasts the entire life of the puppy. The sling allows me to introduce puppies to the world of sights and sounds when it's too soon for feet on the ground. And the Retro Pug sling is the best I've found -- keeps the puppy close and balanced. As a raiser/trainer for puppies for special needs adults and children, this sling is spot on..
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Dibsie

customer_reviews.title: Clearly the best pets sling on the market
customer_reviews.text: Clearly the best pets sling on the market. I love the adjustability and the side pockets I plan on putting two Yorkies in it. The mesh draw String is nice for dogs like mine that travel well. It is good to have the leash clip inside. I feel better about falls, I’ve seen a lot of these....Get this one.Oh yeah and I threw it in the wash and it came out like brand new!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT CAT POUCH!
customer_reviews.text: My kitty LOVES this bag! He has been trained since birth to go into it and he is much bigger now but it still works! I use it to transport him to the Vet as well as the groomer. I find it calms him down to be against me and he sits perfect on my belly area! AND the extended "leash" inside is by far the best. I hook him in and pull the mesh part so he can see and off we go. Quick trips work and I saw people on the plane with their animals and though this would possibly work too (won't be testing that out, js).
customer_reviews.author: Susan Neal

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable for smaller people to wear and my 16 pound dog feels secure
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pet carrier! I use it to carry my 16-pound Chiweenie on walks when she gets tired. (I walk two bigger dogs at the same time). She adapted to it the first time I used it. Her favorite position is to drape her stubby front paws out of the top of the bag. She does not move around and the bag doesn't either when we walk. I'm 5'2" so I had to adjust the strap in the back so the sling would rest near my waist. ,
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Y

customer_reviews.title: High quality and comfy.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pet sling purse I ordered. It is very inexpensive compared to other slings and very convenient for my 6lb poodle. RETRO PUG Kangaroo sling is excellent quality for the price. I was surprised by the comfortable fit, easy to wear and various pockets, good material. As a bonus, a silicone bowl is also included.. So comfortable I could use it as a carry bag for my things when I have her in her crate for travel. Thanks !
customer_reviews.author: allen

customer_reviews.title: Well made quality pet carrier
customer_reviews.text: I already own a bag to carry my dog on my back and was looking to add a bag that allowed me to carry her in front. I rated the bag 4 stars even though I ended up returning it. Unfortunately, my dog was not able to get comfortable in this bag. She was only able to sit and have her head hang out and she was not able to lay down. The carrier was comfortable on me, had lots of pockets and had a solid bottom. It is a good quality solid carrier for the right pet owner. F.Y.I, I have a yorkie that is 9.5 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Mia

customer_reviews.title: It does work
customer_reviews.text: Ok- so it worked for what it’s intended. Kept my lil guy safe and allowed him to come with us the whole hike (we hiked about 5 miles, but because of the terrain it took us several hours). The reason for the 3 stars is because it’s a bit bulky and I’m short and I wish I could shorten it more. There is a way to shorten it some, but it becomes bulky and awkward. Offer more colors and ability to shorten it without the bulk.
customer_reviews.author: Mel bell

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and useful.
customer_reviews.text: After studying other carrier bags, I decided this one might be the most comfortable and practical, so I got it. I and the dog loved it so much that I got another one for a friend. There are many positive things I could say about this bag, but simply put, it is extremely well designed and useful.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia R. Schlosser

customer_reviews.title: A Very Handy and Durable Pet Carrier
customer_reviews.text: What I liked about this pet carrier is the holding capacity of our 5month Yorky (now 7lb), pockets for carry on items, durability of the assembly, and neck padding. Also, the collapsible drinking dish is very handy but the carabiner fell apart after a couple of uses, we just replaced it. What I slightly disliked about this carrier is the length could be a little longer to make it easier to transition on and off the neck. It has been washed several times and the fabric and stitching has been holding up. I would definitely purchase again but would opt for a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Jak Spiez

customer_reviews.title: NOT a soft cuddle bag as the photos might suggest
customer_reviews.text: Too large for my six pound Maltese. A new puppy would be lost it it. There needs to be a smaller version. The material in nice heavy duty nylon and construction is sturdy, but I only gave it 3 stars because of the mesh drawstring top that would not hold up when my pup was young and chewing on her bags. The strap is padded, but too bulky for me. The whole bag is too large
customer_reviews.author: Marcie Y

customer_reviews.title: Going back
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this....i bought this to use for my older yorkie but it's too small. I tried it on my smaller yorkie and it's too awkward. It's very sturdy and thick padded to hang around shoulder. Biggest con is that it's awkward that my yorkies can't seem to find proper balance to sit. Plus the security net feature is super annoying for me to move it out of the way. Overall for comfort and being sturdy I rate it high 4.5 stars. For dog positioning and their comfort I rate it 2 stars which is why it is going back.
customer_reviews.author: Starian

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Practical. Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It is comfy and fits my terrier mix really well. He is 15 pounds but has long legs and he fits well with plenty of room. It is way easier to carry than a purse and I can balance his weight on my hip. I love the mesh that I can close or leave open. The strap is really comfy and the materials are really nice. It feels substantial. I definitely recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Extremely nice dog carrier
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, and I have a very nervous poodle and she loved it . I was expecting her to be freaked out and she was so calm I'm shocked . Very nicely made and I like it better than the ones that hang down longer. I wouldn't think they would feel as close to you plus there safer being close and your arm fits perfectly under the pouch . Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: JessieJames

customer_reviews.title: Finally! Comfortable for both pet and me
customer_reviews.text: When I put the Carrier on, it felt almost weightless. The wide strap is the most comfortable carrier strap I've ever felt. I lifted the pup in and he instantly snuggled down and fell asleep. I cleaned the house and washed the dishes with him in it because he was snoring. In the pictures below you can see that I lifted the Carrier off and put it in his bed on my desk and he slept in the Carrier. Update.. added another pic. Just having coffee and pup barked until I put him into carrier so he can snooze! Who is this dog??? He's not the snuggly type!
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Sandman

customer_reviews.title: better than most. this carrier, could be great
customer_reviews.text: The strap over my shoulder is thick for good weight distribution. My dog weighs 9 lbs. The bag is excellent. I like it enough to keep it. My dog needs to get used to it, so I put her in it for 5-10 mins everyday. In 2 weeks, we will try a trip out in public. The bag could hold the dog better. She can wiggle and stress out and get out of the bag when upset. I would like to pull the shoulder strap up higher so the dog's weight rides on my hip. Overall, a good design, sturdy and worth keeping. Your dog likely would need to adjust to being held this way as mine does.
customer_reviews.author: John Coast

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. My terrier mix is super long and over 20 lbs, she is also 12 years old and has had two surgeries on her spine when she was younger, which now affects her lower back and legs when walking. I needed something specifically for longer trips and travel, especially since I take her on the place with me multiple times a year. This product works wonders. I can now ditch the bulky stroller when heading to the airport. Plus the quality is amazing and both the pup and I were comfortable at all times. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing thing ever. My 13 year old 16lb pug is chillin’ in this pug hammock, she loves it! I bought this to take her on a light hike with the other pups. Didn’t want her to miss out! ☺️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I purchased them for my 15 lb Shih Tzu and my 9 lb Shih Tzu mix. They love being in the carrier's and they seem to be very comfortable in them. We traveled from Montreal Canada to Texas and used the carrier's whenever we visited locations that didn't allow dogs. We also used them whenever we were walking for long periods. We used them at Niagara Falls and at several breweries. My male pup is a bit unfriendly when it comes to other dogs, this carrier allowed us to go to places where other dogs were and avoid any "dog drama".
customer_reviews.author: Ma Du Ran

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this product. Went to vet w/2 pupps. Had one in sling. Sling had loop to hook keys to and pockets for my phone, wallet, and paperwork. Both hands were free to carry other pup and sign paperwork. My scared pup felt very comforted being in the sling close to her mom. Well worth the money!!! My pup was afraid to ride in the car but did much better while in the sling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great find - will save the day!
customer_reviews.text: We are planning to travel by plane and this bag will come in so handy. My little Havanese grunts when I pick him up, so being able to let him sit in the bag is more comfortable for him While he may not look very happy in this pic, he was comfortable, just unsure of what I was doing with him. He has been much better since.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I really love this carry bag for my 10 lb dog. It is comfortable and deep enough the she can sit or lie down in it. The mesh top is helpful to keep her in. And the pockets are great for a few personal items. The only issue I have is the stiching on the shoulder is already coming undone. The supplier was friendly and sent me a new product so to my stitchin issue. I have been using it and it is holding up. I really love this carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: If you are raising a dog that is difficult to walk, it is highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.text: Because she is being treated for hips, walking is difficult for the time being. For her we bought a sling carrier. She relies comfortably, as if she had used this bag since long ago. The ergonomic design of the bag was a big help to her most especially when taking public transportation in bringing the puppy to the vet for regular check ups and vaccinations. The bag is sturdy, water proof and made with high quality materials. If you are raising a dog that is difficult to walk, it is highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: aa

customer_reviews.title: GREAT OUTER DESIGN!  NEEDS ADJUSTING...
customer_reviews.text: Much of this design is amazing. Comfort thick padded strap. Strong, roomy pouch. Horrible mesh design with slide closure that only has opening in exact center top of pouch. I’m going to cut it out with scissors...either have a zipper installed or Velcro. The rest of the design is so good I want to keep it! The mesh idea is TERRIBLE and not useful for a live dog!!!! Oh my! Great previous products from this company and this one is ALMOST really good.
customer_reviews.author: CUMI

customer_reviews.title: The Jury is out on this one
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this carrier. It is made really well, and looks very nice. I have an 11 pound puppy I wanted to carry around the house at times, because my larger dog likes to nibble on feet of the smaller pets. This carrier is very awkward and cumbersome/bulky. It is not practical if you really need to use your hands for anything else. It does have pockets store a little cash and a phone if you went out, but I don't think you could really spend a long time wearing this. I tried it a few times around the house, and it was just annoying. Id rather keep the dogs seperate for now.
customer_reviews.author: Lyatt17

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: It is very comfortable for us and for the dogs! My dog love stay inside. She is a winner dog and this size is perfect for her long body.
customer_reviews.author: Vivika

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and secure
customer_reviews.text: My new puppy Memphis 9wk old Standard Wirehaired Dachshund; made it through a 13 hr car ride from Arizona to California! It hangs perfectly over head rest and I placed a xsmall snoozzy kennel mat for softness. I love that it came with a collapseable water bowl!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: A Fabulous sling bag for dogs.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my retro pug sling bag. We recently adopted a 10 year old Dachshund weighing 9#. We had tickets to go to the Miami Boat Show before we got our little Josephine. We didn't know what we are going to do when we had to walk around the grounds for 4 days. Her 9 pounds gets heavy after a while just carrying her. We ordered another bag first and we're very disappointed. Then we ordered the Retro pug sling bag and tried her in it. She absolutely loved it and was jumping up to try to get in it all the time. Thank you very much retro pug sling bag. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: I like the padded strap and the size. It was roomy enough for my 13+lb cat. What I didnt like was the quality of the mesh and drawstring closure. Looked very cheap and already pilling. I doubt it would last long. Wish those parts used better material. Also when you shorten the strap it bunches up into a large awkward bunch. Seems over priced for the quality and features. Overall look was nice but I decided to return.
customer_reviews.author: Peach

customer_reviews.title: Hands free
customer_reviews.text: Just want to show off my adorable 17lb Shih Tzu in this awesome carrier. It does make Milo overheat, especially because dogs are so hot blooded. I wouldn’t use this carrier in over 60 degrees F. I like this carrier because it frees my hands while using public transportation. It has some tiny holes in the bottom, but shouldn’t be an issue. It folds up small.
customer_reviews.author: Milo’shuman

customer_reviews.title: My Yorkie loves this
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 5 pound Yorkie because her travel bag was hurting my shoulder and neck. This bag is very comfortable and I can hardly tell that I'm carrying her. She got right into it and loves that I can carry her around in front of me. She can see out either through each end or pop her head out of the middle. I like that there is a net that zips across the top for her safety. I'm not sure the zipper is going to last long as it seems a bit wimpy. There are side pockets for our stuff. We are both very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Your dog will love this
customer_reviews.text: My dog and I love this sling. My dog is around 15 lbs and was too big for most slings. This one has plenty of room and I love that I can close her in more with the mesh. She is so relaxed in there and sometimes leans back and I used to worry about her falling out. I carry her in it when I run errands to the store, etc. Even places that say "no pets" don't seem to mind if she's in this sling.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this bag. I have a 6 lb. chihuahua that goes everywhere with me and it is so compfy for her. An area inside the bag can be tightened so that she won’t fall out. The strap is very well padded and wide which makes it very comfortable for a 68 yr. lady to handle. The color of the bag hides dirt and stains. What more can I say? I’ve tried several carriers and they cannot compare. Plus, the seller is very friendly and answers any questions you have. Don’t hesitate to buy this for your little furry baby ..... you’ll be very glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great carrier-used it on a 4-wheeler😁
customer_reviews.text: I have a 21 lb mini Schnauzer. This sling worked great! I put it on cinched him in and took off on my quad!(4 wheeler). Once he figured out he could lay down he went to sleep in the carrier. My only complaints/ suggestions are: I wish the nylon material went a bit higher up and the tether has inside was not sewn in very well. Also just an FYI if you are tall (I’m 5’5) this carrier will be too short.
customer_reviews.author: kp

customer_reviews.title: Good product and great seller
customer_reviews.text: I bought the RETRO PUG Travel Mate Pet Carrier Sling Bag February 8, 2019. In February 2020 I noticed that a shoulder strap was ripping from the bag. I sent a note to RETRO PUG asking if they could replace it. I was astonished that they immediately replied that they provide a lifetime warranty and I received a new bag in a few days. This is among the BEST CUSTOMER SERVICE I HAVE EVER SEEN!! AND, the product is great. Thank you Mr. Shin!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend RETRO PUG Pet Sling Carrier Bag to anyone who ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a miniture doxie. She hasn't wanted to walk because it's too cold, but she wants to go wherever her big sister, a standard poodle, goes. I pop her in the sling and off we go. The sling saves my arms and back and affords all of us an enjoyable outdoor experience. I would recommend RETRO PUG Pet Sling Carrier Bag to anyone who has an animal that needs to be carried. It's my and my doxie's happy bag. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jennie833

customer_reviews.title: she loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a carrier for my cat and dog. I like the space where she can relax and the mesh window where she can see outside. A wide shoulder strap makes me comfortable. A variety of pockets can safely store my wallet and personal belongings. Good quality products, sturdy and durable fabric and grey color are great because everything is right for me! She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Sujinoh

customer_reviews.title: best carrier we ever got!
customer_reviews.text: there is plenty of room inside so dog isn't fidgety. Easy to get her in and out. extra vest strap and zipper net help to prevent the carrier from rolling when sitting and standing. extra pockets are great for flaslights and keys.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made bag
customer_reviews.text: The bag is very well made and sturdy, but a bit too big and voluminous for me and my 14 lb dog. Being an “over one shoulder” bag, I also find the strap is pulling on that side of my body and I start walking lop-sided. This means I need to get a carrier that has straps crossing on my back.
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome comfort and our dog feels safe!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves this! He took to it right away and felt comfortable in it and safe immediately! I love the detachable water bowl, we use it more than I ever thought we would! We just leave it in the truck and our dog is always ready to go!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Baker

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Dog Accessory
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only done a trial run since I got my pet carrier, but my mini doodle, Sheldon, who’s a pretty laid back guy, seemed very comfortable in his sling, and I was able to carry him comfortably, too. He weighs about 15 lbs. and his weight was nicely distributed by the width and construction of the crossbody strap. We’re looking forward to being able to go out together more often.
customer_reviews.author: Poodlelady48

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, wrong color.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: The company without even needing to comment me sent me the correct color, a travel water bowl, and didn’t even ask for the other one back! Excellent customer service to go with an excellent product. I love the product, and I was very excited to get it. What I wasn’t excited about was the fact that I ordered a gray sling, and recieved a navy sling. Although I do love the functionality of the product, I’m very dissapointed in getting the wrong color.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Bell

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & roomy, well crafted
customer_reviews.text: Love the design of this carrier as it is quite sturdy. The fabric will work perfectly; the mesh gives added security; its fairly roomy; and the strap is nice & wide to disperse the load of the dog's weight. Only way that I can see to improve it, perhaps, is to have a small semi-rigid rectangular panel at the bottom so the dog can lay upon it without its legs cramped. However, I am over-all quite happy with this carrier and my 15 lb. Podenco Andaluz seems to be OK with it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Windhoundfan

customer_reviews.title: Great bag and accommodates quite well!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to tote around my 9lb Yorkie, Tessa. Initially, I thought it was too large for her, but after a few times proved to be a perfect fit and she feels safe and snug when she hunkers down from what she perceives as a threat to her. My only concern is that it becomes too heavy for me to carry her for any length of time, for I am in my 80s, but easy-peasy for a younger, stronger body. Tessa is also very stubborn and when determined can wiggle her way up through the safety net closure! Overall it's a great bag and now that I'm getting the 'hang' of it, suits me just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Olga Wiens

customer_reviews.title: I let him run as long as he can then I have the perfect place to keep him warm and cozy
customer_reviews.text: It is just the right size for 12# Yourkie Bentley. We go for long walks with the rest of his doggie brothers they are Springer's. Living in Wisconsin the snow slows down the Yourkie. I let him run as long as he can then I have the perfect place to keep him warm and cozy. He won't be sliding out the bottom of my jacket this year. I was stopped by fellow dog walker she also has a small dog. I believe after she had a chance to check it out she was going home to order one for her jack russel mix.. The wide cushion strap very comfortable. Have retro pug sling will travel!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tamie Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Love this carrier.
customer_reviews.text: Love this carrier. I have a 6 lb. chihuahua that goes everywhere with me and it is so compfy for her. An area inside the bag can be tightened so that she won’t fall out. The strap is very well padded and wide which makes it very comfortable. The material of the bag can easily remove dust and dirt. I’ve tried several carriers and they cannot compare. Plus, the seller is very friendly and answers any questions you have. Don’t hesitate to buy this for your puppy. It is highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Any

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I am using my sling for my therapy dog. She is no longer allowed to sit in her covering in a cart so this is my alternative and it works, although she was moving a lot. It is then difficult on the neck and back. I can remember similar items when my children were tiny and I am sure the same would apply, but the quality and durability seem good
customer_reviews.author: Maia Rose

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for us but could for taller people
customer_reviews.text: The manner of adjusting the strap did not work for my family. If you make it as small/short as possible, it leaves a big lump of fabric and stuffing. The strap itself is fluffy, almost like it is filled with stuffing (no idea if it is, just feels this way), soft and comfy to wear but too bulky for my liking (and to wear around in Florida). The actual sling was very nice with nice materials. The strap was the deal breaker, as various members need to use the sling to carry our puppy around.
customer_reviews.author: Bruan J.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and great for small pets
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great product. One of my little dogs is unfortunately getting old and is losing mobility in his back legs. This sling works great for packing him around. It's comfortable to wear and the adjustable strap is a great feature. He isn't used to the feeling of being packed around yet so he isn't sitting as comfortably as I hoped he would but in time I think he will enjoy it. The bottom of the bag is slippery for him so I put a small blanket in the bottom to help him sit better and that seemed to help. Overall I'm very pleased with the design and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like it all. I have not been able to send it back because of a long illness and then death in my family. I wish I could send it back but obviously I’m stuck with a useless carrier that is bundlesome and definitely not a crossbody. Not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Sizemore

customer_reviews.title: Needs shoulder strap re-design....
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality material and overall size, but the shoulder strap needs different design because: 1. the “shortening pull strap” is a horrible design because when pulled shorter the overstuffed excess shoulder strap bunches up and makes a huge thick wad of padded material. 2. it’s actually OVER stuffed with padding, just a slight decrease would help, nice thoughtful idea to pad but doesn’t work with current design. I wanted to like this so much but don’t use it because the strap is too long without shortening and when shortened the problems listed above make it un-usable. :-(
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Works for my 13 lb Yorkie
customer_reviews.text: My 13 lb Yorkie fits in it very well and she seems comfortable. I have to shift it around on my shoulder to find the right place or it seems to cut in a bit - though the strap is nicely padded. The inside security collar strap is thin so I'm not sure if it would hold her if she was determined to get out - so I use the netting for extra security. Fortunately, she hasn't yet tried to escape. I do like the pockets for personal items and the material is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: JB Gainesville, VA

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This looked like a comfortable bag that could handle our 17lb puppy but it failed on the first trip. The handle tore on one side within an hour. The handle is also too short. Has an adjustment to make shorter but not longer. To top it off, the travel bowl wasn’t included, which one of the reasons I ordered this bag and not another.
customer_reviews.author: Monika Petrova

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sling for my dog recovering from surgery
customer_reviews.text: My toy poodle has total paralysis in her back legs and recently underwent surgery. We needed something to carry her around in, and it couldn't have her seated upright, and it needed to be very safe. This sling is very durable and DEEP which is great to keep her safe. My dog is very finicky but she settled right into the sling and trusts it, so it is a HUGE winner. We looked for hours for something that would work and this is great.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Lucky is loving her new sling!
customer_reviews.text: After a long search and a couple of misguided purchases, I have finally found a sling that is a good fit for my 15 pound dachshund. The sling is very well made and durable. She fits very well in it and so far it has been very comfortable on my shoulders due to the wide, sturdy strap. The only suggestion/wish I have is that there was some type of removable firm base to place in the sling for support under my dog. I found that folding up a small towel provides a bit of support for her body and little legs. Overall great product that I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Doo

customer_reviews.title: Corgi Bliss
customer_reviews.text: Best Design for my active life. Able to do all my "chores" on the ranch with corgi puppy in tow. Allows me to walk, bend, twist, sweep, shop, ride my horse. So well made, designed has pocket for cell phone and other goodies. The gray color is beautiful. Watch the video with the customer who shows all the features. My puppy is 3 lbs. the sling will hold her up to 10 lbs or more. Should be made in America, with an american flag attached would be the only comment that would make this product better.
customer_reviews.author: Laura L. Yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: High quality bag
customer_reviews.text: I got this to carry my senior yorkie mix. He's around 15 lbs. He can walk just fine but when we go to the outdoor market he's over it after 30 mins. He fit in just fine. The shoulder strap is very padded and the canvas of the bag is very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great for sightseeing with small dog.
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my vacation when we were sightseeing. My 16 lb chihuahua has lots of energy, but 5 miles in one day was too much for her. We had her in the pouch when she was tired of walking, then back out when she wanted to walk. One suggestion: for long periods of carrying with dog, switch what side the pouch is on every so often to prevent long periods of weight on one side - avoid stiff neck.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, was just what I was looking for, great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the quality of the bag and the size. My dog fits in there great and the mesh you can tighten to keep the dog in is a plus. I did have the stitching undo on a pocket the first day I had it. I wrote to the company and they immediately took care of it for me. Good customer service! Good product! I would buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I have a dachshund, standard size, weighs 22lbs. He fits perfect for the length and weight.
customer_reviews.author: MacKenzie Webster

customer_reviews.title: OMG...COMFORTABLE, PROVIDING CLOSENESS FOR ANXIOUS TRAVELING PETS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog would crawl into his PET SLING PURSE EVEN AT HOME, he so loved the sense of security it provided. Love the ease of use and extra storage compartments...EXTRA BONUS!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those pets that like to be carried close to their owners
customer_reviews.text: I bought several other pet carrier devices before I found this one. This one is perfect for me and my Italian Greyhound of 18 pounds. My dog likes to be carried close to my chest/body and this sling offers that close proximity while securely keeping my dog in place. There is enough room for my dog to change positions, sit, stand, and lay down. I would definitely recommend this pet carrier sling to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: RoRo

customer_reviews.title: He rested comfortably in the bag
customer_reviews.text: Received this Kangaroo sling few days ago. I purchased this sling to travel with the Maltese I am raising. It's made so well, that I feel confident that my pup will like it. The cushioned strap is great. He rested comfortably in the bag. This sling is easy to carry and very light. And there are plenty of devices for storing water bottles, poop bags and bonus silicone bowls. Hands are free when going out with dog. Highly recommended for those who have small dogs!
customer_reviews.author: Sujinoh

customer_reviews.title: Hangs too low if you're short
customer_reviews.text: If you're short (I'm 5.2) the sling hangs too low on my body (below my waist). I wish I the strap could be shortened more. My 16 lbs dog likes it. But she struggles to keep her head out as the pouch is too deep for her size. I wish the pouch wasn't so deep.
customer_reviews.author: Terrier lover

customer_reviews.title: Dog likes this carrier
customer_reviews.text: Got as a gift for a friend with an old dog weighing 18#. When we walk when the old guy gets tired he sits down and expects to be carried. They had tried a different carrier that dog didn’t like and squirmed and tried to get out of. Dog seems to like this one, cooperates while being placed in carrier and seems to have a smile on his face. Sometimes when carrier is lying on floor dog goes over and lies on it. Much easier to carry him in sling carrier then under your arm. Very happy with purchase, other dog owners we run into while walking stop and admire it.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: My puppy is only 40 ounces. He gets lost in it. But I'm sure he'll grow into it and I'll use more often. Comfortable to wear and the pocket carries water to go along with the included bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Warwick

customer_reviews.title: Nice carrier
customer_reviews.text: It’s a sturdy carrier. My dog seems comfortable in it. It’s really nice. I love the color and padding on the strap. I just wish there was some padding inside so it could provide some cushion for my dog as she lays/sits down and bring her up a bit because the edge of the carrier pushes on her neck. I have to adjust her just right so it doesn’t cause her any discomfort. The mesh with drawstring inside for safety feels and looks cheap but works well.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Best dog carrier imaginable!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased many carriers for my 5 lbs. Yorkie. There is not another one like this. Comfortable for me and perfect for her. 2 mesh side windows. She can actually lay down and look out the windows instead of always wanting to have her head up. Pockets are a bonus of a phone or treats. If this one wears out...I will purchase the exact same one again. I say everyday how much I love this dog carrier. Good job Retro pug !
customer_reviews.author: Kimberloohoo

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 18 lb dog and she seems very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this durable doggie sling and found it rather comfortable for short walks, saving my senior pup from walking up and down the dunes as we head to beach. The only thing I would change is the size of the safety hook since my pup's harness has a very thick leash attachment loop, but connecting by adding a carabiner works. Thank you for offering this, I've recommended it to a number of people.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs B

customer_reviews.title: My dog love it.
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely love this! He is getting older so he gets tired a lot fast now. So this is perfect. My dog has horrible anxiety and is on meds Because of it so I wasn’t sure if he would like it. But he loved it! I was shocked! Now he will be able to go more places with us. I highly recommend this. I was also very happy with the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Price

customer_reviews.title: A great bag
customer_reviews.text: We have a small Bo_Jack and I don't like her on a leash in crowds, I fear she would get stepped on. This bag is the answer, at the farmers market, street fairs or car shows she is out of harms way. I set the bag down and she leaps in, off we go.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for 16 pound minpin
customer_reviews.text: My dog is an elderly mostly blind minpin. He has a longish body and is broadchested and most carriers do not fit. This is the only one that fit him comfortably. We need it when downtown in crowded streets. He is able to stay comfortably close to the body and high enough that he’s not swinging around. He also has his head out and doesn’t miss anything. We like that you can cinch the carrier to close tighter to keep him in and that it has a clasp we can secure to his harness.
customer_reviews.author: EmmaLee

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded My Expectations by far!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 19 yr old peekapoo, 12 lbs, who starts hikes with a lot of energy and then runs out of steam. This carrier is extremely comfortable, very very well made, waterproof, and has storage for small items. Bonus, the fabic looks like a rich gray linen and goes with everything! I am so happy i spent the extra money as the quality and functionality of this carrier exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Deceiving
customer_reviews.text: My dog basically sunk in this. He is a 10lb Shih Tzu but this bag is just huge. It is not well vented and I felt he would have suffocated should i have left him in it
customer_reviews.author: Amy M

customer_reviews.title: Very good; could use more floor support.
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty sturdy item, and my 12-lb Rat Terrier took to it quite naturally. The shoulder strap is a huge boon; clearly designed for carrying comfort. The bottom could have a little more support built into it. People have complimented me when I'm walking around with River in it!
customer_reviews.author: L. Wanzer

customer_reviews.title: Nice item, not built right for larger owners.
customer_reviews.text: Like: dog fits inside (12#), and he was comfortable for hours. Dislike: flexibility in strap is non-existent and I don't recall noting that on the description. I am a larger sized woman (than in the add), I could not fit it over head and get dog settled, had to wear it over single shoulder so not as hands free as would like. If you are size 10 or smaller, should work as designed.
customer_reviews.author: luvxmas

customer_reviews.title: Dog doesn’t fit in it comfortably and it’s not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The quality seems decent when you take it out of the bag but my dog didn’t like it. Said it fits up to a 15 pound dog and she is a 9 pound Pom and was uncomfortable and could never get situated in it right. It wasn’t that great for carrying her around in and was awful for airplane and travel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: By far the best carrier I've bought for my fur baby
customer_reviews.text: By far the best carrier I've bought for my fur baby. She's about 13 pounds and sits very comfortably in it. The material is not cheap, I really love the dark denim color, and the two pockets on the strap. My iPhone plus fits perfectly in the pocket. This is the 4th carrier I've bought, for the price I thought it was a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: claud9

customer_reviews.title: Love it....but strap started to rip
customer_reviews.text: I took the bag on a recent trip. Unfortunately one of the straps already started to rip away from the body of the bag. It’s safely not something easy sewed either. I was disappointed because this bag is very comfortable for me and my furbaby. I like the style, comfort, and storage on it more than the sling bag they sell (which I have for going around town or hikes).
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Puppy Tote!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 4lb toy poodle and a 7 lb miniature poodle. Sometimes they needed to be carried. They both fit comfortably in this bag; the shoulder strap is wide and padded so it’s not a strain on my body either. There are enough pockets for some potty bags & paper towels. It’s perfect for our needs!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl B.

customer_reviews.title: Love your product, but does not fit my Pugger.
customer_reviews.text: Hey Guys, you have a beautiful product, but it is advertised to hold pets up to 20 lbs. My pug is 16 lbs and does not fit. However, I am keeping this carrier/papoose for future animals. If you have a larger similar carrier, I will buy that too. This is not a slam against your product because it is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Wallen

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: First off they sent me the wrong color, which I am willing to live with but as soon as I put my 10lb cat in it to test it I out for my 20lb pug a button flys off. Not well made at all. I’ma little weary on putting my pup in this. Will update if it holds up. Update: the company reached out to me and sent me a new one
customer_reviews.author: Amber Hagen

customer_reviews.title: Great pet sling! I love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is the third sling I have purchased for my dog and it is by far the best one. The size, the comfort and convenience of this sling is the best. My dog is 15 lbs and he loves being carried around in it when he gets tired on hikes or when he gets nervous around crowds or a lot of noise. He feels very safe in it. Love the padding in the strap and the adjustability in length. And I love the material it is made out of. This was very well thought out and I thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Darcy

customer_reviews.title: This carrier it easy to carry my 5 lb Maltese.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my Retro pug Travel mate sling carrier. We recently adopted a 1 year old Maltese. Her weight is about 5 lbs. We ordered another bag first and we're very disappointed. Then we ordered the Retro pug pet sling carrier and tried her in it. She absolutely loved it and was jumping up to try to get in it all the time. Thank you very much retro pug sling carrier. We love it !!
customer_reviews.author: allen

customer_reviews.title: Too small, but still use
customer_reviews.text: When I measured my dog, I thought he’d fit. The way the bag fold up takes some room out, so if your dog is the same size as the bag, it won’t fit. It was too small for my dachshund mix, so I have to hold half of him outside the bag, but I still really love it. The extra padding on the shoulder strap is an amazing help.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlei

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this sling bag recently to travel with my dog for camping. I have traveled before with her but in a soft kennel. This carrier was incredible. My dog is about 10 lbs and it was so much easier to carrier her in this way. She was happier and more comfortable also. I found that she fit better sort of upright.I was satisfied with many pockets. The bottom of the bag was made in round form with the pads so that I could support my puppy and it was very strong. The sling bag I saw recently is the most durable. I recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: marshall wang

customer_reviews.title: Works for slightly over 20 lb dogs!
customer_reviews.text: I had to get a 21 lb recently rescued dog that freezes with anxiety in crowds through two airports and two flights. He did GREAT with this product! It was perfectly spacious, sturdy, and comfortable for him and me! Honestly, I most surprised by the comfort, the strap is padded and designed very well for the pet parent. The netting with a drawstring was perfect to draw around his shoulders to keep him inside and at sometimes he preferred the sling to sitting outside of it. I assume this is because it made a secure feeling pouch to hug him on all sides. Would get again for travel with him and recommend it to anyone in a similar situation!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: My 15 lb dog was safer, calm with this carrier.
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I ordered this product because it kept my dog calm and secured leaving my hands free for attending to all required travel needs, paperwork over airlines counters to handling my suitcases. I did placed a towel folded for comfort and added firmness/positioning. During 3 hr flight, I just loosen the carrier and he was a happy puppy. Other travelers were amazed how well he traveled with this carrier! (prior to ordering this product I had a carrier with wheels from other company, however, every time I practiced at home, he was uneasy and nervous reason why I decided to go with your Carrier. It was the perfect solution!!
customer_reviews.author: carolina r.

customer_reviews.title: A great sturdy sling for medium size dogs
customer_reviews.text: This sling is very helpful for carrying my dog up and down 2 flights of stairs. My 19 pound Cavalier refuses to walk up or down the stairs and we live on the third floor! My husband and I are older and need to hold on to the bannister with one hand as we walk down the stairs. This sling is a Godsend. It is very sturdy. It is nearly impossible to find a sling that would accommodate a dog this size so I’m so happy we did. Before only our son could walk her because we couldn’t carry her down the stairs. Now she gets more walks so we are all happier!
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Schefflin

product_meta.title: RETRO PUG Pet Carrier for Small and Medium Dogs,Cat - Pet Sling Purse - Front Pack – Travel Puppy Carrying Bag – Doggie Pouch – Adjustable Shoulder Strap – Tote Papoose – Chest Holder - 15~20 lbs
feature_bullets: ◆WHAT YOU NEED: As the master of a medium or small-sized dog, you know that sometimes the leash is not a solution. For easy and comfortable transportation of your pet, we have the perfect answer: the adjustable pet sling

◆SAFE FOR THE PET: Our dog carrier for medium dogs has a 3-second strap that allows you to adjust the length of the dog purse, offering full comfort and flexibility. The double safety device will also prevent your dog from popping out of the bag

◆WATERPROOF: The dog front carrier has a premium waterproof material that will keep your dog dry even during heavy rain. Your pup can stay safe and comfortable in his own place while you reach the destination

◆PAINLESS: Although carrying your 15-20 pounds dog on the should bag doesn’t seem very comfortable, in reality, the strap/pad set has a special ergonomic design that is easy and lightweight, keeping you safe from shoulder pain

◆LIFETIME FREE REPLACEMENT WARRANTY + 30 DAY MONEY BACK SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: Our RETRO PUG Dog Sling carriers bag is backed by our manufacturer 30-day money back guarantee with a lifetime free replacement warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
